name: 1V1 Game (Unity)
description:
I made a mini-game to test the rhythm games like in Crypt of the Necrodancer. The goal is to kill the opponent. The goal was to do some tests in programming like raycasts or how to move in this kind of game. 

controls : 

Player 1 : 

Move : ZQSD

Shot 1 : E

Shot 2 :  R

Player 2 : 

Move : Arrows

Shot 1 : Numpad 1

Shot 2 :  Numpad 2

There are 3 types of shots:

- Fireballs. 
- Lasers.
- Arrows. 

Each shot has different properties and damage.
